Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJAC WHERE IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY PERICODI DESC
INSERT INTO CAM_SOLHOJAC ( SOLHOJACCODI, PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :SOLHOJACCODI, :PROYCODI, :FECPUESTAOPE, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )
UPDATE CAM_SOLHOJAC SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE = :FECPUESTAOPE, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE SOLHOJACCODI = :SOLHOJACCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJAC ORDER BY SOLHOJACCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_SOLHOJAC SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
